songs.title: Come To Me
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
Me ne Bae hyase from scratch
Butterfly love

[Verse 1: Sarkodie]
Me ne no mmienu nea yekyiri koraa ne night club
Netflix and chill
Tɛkyerɛma fefa tɛkyerɛma hoa you know the deal
Night beach, road trips and slow jams
Eduru anadwoa abi you know we go HAM
Nea me hwehwɛ aa na me nsa aka no
Me ngyae no nkasɛ oh damn
I got some real love for you
Test me cuz I can die for you
Ɛnwon no firi akoma mu nti me de makoma no ma wo
Sɛ so mu n'agyea me tumi de me bank account
Na me de bɛma wo sɛ sɔ mu n'agye no for free

[Pre Chorus: Sarkodie & Bobii Lewis]
Baby imma ride for you
Gimme your insta and I go follow
Uh. Tie
Romeo ne Julie kinda love
Ɛba no ɔdɔ kan aa my baby gave me enough
Talk to me Bae

[Chorus: Bobii Lewis]
Something that you need?
Baby come to me
For you I be on time
Ɔdɔ make you all mine
You don't need a boy
Yeah yeah come to me
You don't need a boy
Yeah yeah right yeah
Oh oh oh oh
Be queen and you from before
Be wanting you
Wanting you you you you you you you
Eh

[Verse 2: Sarkodie]
Hwɛ Ladies and gentlemen
Meserɛ me wasɛm bi ka
Mpaninfuo n'ɛkaa ɔmo asɛm sɛɛ
Nipa nua ne nipa
Nti sɛ asɛm bi n'ɛkyi m'adwen so aa
Menkata so mɛ bisa
Girl bia me nsa aka no girl no
Me se girl no mpɛ me sika
Sɛ me tɔ mpaboa bɛkyɛ noa ɔse please
Me nso ɛyɛ a na ɛha me
Cuz I just wanna be sweet
Tɔ dabia me stalk no checki checki ne tweets
Cuz I find it hard to believe sɛ ibi only me
Charley girl no body
Me ka me nana duku
Ɔpapa ɔwono koraa mpo ntumi nhwɛ ne nufu
Tɔ dabia opie aa m'adwen yɛ me sɛɛ boys pii be use
Nti otua na matiem
Na me tetɛ lungulungu
Me nkwadaa dwene kakraa me wɔ ne sɛɛ
Me feeli sɛ ɛnnyɛ me nkoaa na me girl
Ebia na deɛ me dwene koraa ɛnyɛ saa
Nti maame sɔfo bɔ mmɔden nakyerɛ maseɛ

[Pre Chorus: Sarkodie & Bobii Lewis]
See Baby imma ride for you
Gimme your insta and I go follow
Uh
Me se Romeo ne Julie kinda love
Ɛba no odo kan aa my baby gave me enough
Talk to me Bae

[Chorus: Bobii Lewis]
Something that you need?
Baby come to me
For you I be on time
Ɔdɔ make you all mine
You don't need a boy
Yeah yeah come to me
You don't need a boy
Yeah yeah right yeah
Oh oh oh oh
Be queen and you from before
Be wanting you
Wanting you you you you you you you
